title: Deep Chocolate Glaze
instructions: Melt the two squares of unsweetened chocolate in a small pan set over hot water and set aside.

In a small saucepan, combine the sugar and water, and bring the mixture to a boil over medium heat.  Bring the syrup to a boil, stirring constantly, and allow it come to boil for half minute.  Reduce the heat to low and stir in the melted chocolate.  Once the chocolate has all been incorporated add the butter and stir it into the chocolate as it melts.  Turn off the heat and slowly beat in the milk with a wire whisk; keep beating until the chocolate is of spreading consistency.
While the chocolate glaze is still warm pour it over the cake allowing it to run down the sides.  Let the cake stand until the glaze is set.
Remarks:  It’s best to have all the ingredients measured out and set aside before you start.
Yield:  About ¼ to ⅓ cup.
